20110110030323.000|20110110030324.000|CC1|HAITI WAS TORN TO PIECES BY A   
20110110030324.000|20110110030328.000|CC1|SUDDEN CATASTROPHIC EARTHQUAKE. 
20110110030328.000|20110110030329.000|CC1|>> THERE'S NOT ENOUGH DOCTORS TO

20110110030336.000|20110110030338.000|CC1|WHOLE NEIGHBORS SWALLOWED UP.   
20110110030338.000|20110110030342.000|CC1|230,000 LIVES LOST.             
20110110030342.000|20110110030342.000|CC1|AND THEN LAST FALL, ANOTHER     
20110110030342.000|20110110030346.000|CC1|DISASTER STRUCK.                
20110110030346.000|20110110030347.000|CC1|CHOLERA, A DISEASE TRANSMITTED  
20110110030347.000|20110110030349.000|CC1|THROUGH WATER, WHICH CAN CAUSE  
20110110030349.000|20110110030351.000|CC1|FATAL DEHYDRATION.              
20110110030351.000|20110110030353.000|CC1|THIS TIME THE DEVASTATION SPREAD
20110110030353.000|20110110030356.000|CC1|BEYOND THE QUAKE ZONE INTO

20110110030404.000|20110110030406.000|CC1|IN THE HAITI MOUNTAINS WHERE    
20110110030406.000|20110110030407.000|CC1|40,000 PEOPLE LIVED OFF THE

20110110030447.000|20110110030448.000|CC1|>> Reporter: STAN BROCK, HEAD OF
20110110030448.000|20110110030451.000|CC1|THE TENNESSEE-BASED NONPROFIT

20110110030459.000|20110110030501.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER STAN WAS TOLD
20110110030501.000|20110110030502.000|CC1|OF THE DIRE SITUATION IN MEDOR  
20110110030502.000|20110110030507.000|CC1|BY A CATHOLIC PARISH, OUR LADY

20110110030655.000|20110110030659.000|CC1|HAITI, TO BUILD AN AIR STRIP, TO
20110110030659.000|20110110030701.000|CC1|PARACHUTE PEOPLE IN, WHEN THERE 
20110110030701.000|20110110030704.000|CC1|IS NO PLACE FOR THEM TO REALLY

20110110030820.000|20110110030821.000|CC1|>> Reporter: EVEN THOUGH SOME

20110110030823.000|20110110030826.000|CC1|VILLAGERS, LANDING ON ROCKS OR  
20110110030826.000|20110110030828.000|CC1|TREES, IN LAND WITH

20110110035444.000|20110110035446.000|CC1|COUNTRY, BOARDED UP INTO A WORLD
20110110035446.000|20110110035447.000|CC1|WAR II AIRPLANE, MADE A JUMP    
20110110035447.000|20110110035449.000|CC1|INTO A DROP ZONE THAT NOBODY HAD
20110110035449.000|20110110035449.000|CC1|EVER SEEN.

20110110035451.000|20110110035454.000|CC1|ON A SUCCESSFUL JUMP, SUCCESSFUL
20110110035454.000|20110110035455.000|CC1|MISSION.                        
20110110035455.000|20110110035456.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT TO REALLY

20110110035459.000|20110110035500.000|CC1|NEARBY MOUNTAIN AND GAZED IN    
20110110035500.000|20110110035500.000|CC1|AWE.

20110110035509.000|20110110035511.000|CC1|ON DAY FOUR IT RAN INTO A       
20110110035511.000|20110110035513.000|CC1|DAUNTING WALL OF JUNGLE.        
20110110035513.000|20110110035518.000|CC1|NOW AFTER 12 DAYS, IT WAS A     
20110110035518.000|20110110035519.000|CC1|1500-FOOT LONG AIRSTRIP AND A   
20110110035519.000|20110110035519.000|CC1|LIFE LINE FOR THE PEOPLE OF

20110110035530.000|20110110035532.000|CC1|GOT TO KEEP DOING THIS.         
20110110035532.000|20110110035533.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT AS PROUD AS    
20110110035533.000|20110110035536.000|CC1|DICK WAS, THE AIRSTRIP WAS STILL

20110110035631.000|20110110035633.000|CC1|LITTLE PLANE INTO THE VALLEY,
